ItemConsumable.name: sentinel drone
ItemConsumable.description: A computer controlled laser gun mounted on a sturdy quadruped frame. Once deployed it won't last very long. But can be useful when you need more firepower and a distraction, or a guard to block a choke point.
ItemConsumable.effectSpawn: You setup and activate the sentinel drone, watching it power up and start to scan the area for enemies, its laser weapon sweeping back and forth.
